prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Synth Pad, Guitar, Drums, Strings, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Synth Pad, Guitar, Drums, and Strings, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Synth Pad, Guitar, Drums, and Strings, with no Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, which does include Bass, Synth Pad, Guitar, Drums, and Strings.
